taskbody.prereq:
The following steps will help you clean the ice cream maker.
Goal: Clean ice cream machine
Audience: Student or faculty in Shanks
Materials: Machine and included parts, moist cloth, working sink, warm water, soap
Before using the machine, make sure it is clean.

step.cmd: Ensure the workspace is clean and open, see Figure 2

substep.cmd: This is important as there are many movable parts and the cleaning surface should be clear.

step.cmd: Wipe motor base with moist cloth prior to using

substep.cmd: Make sure to remove any dust or residue from the manufacturing and shipping process

step.cmd: Detach lid, freezer bowl, and mixing arm from main component of the machine

info.note: Do not immerse the water base in water.

step.cmd: Wash the lid, freeze bowl, and mixing arm in warm water

info.note: Do not use any abrasive cleaners.
Do not put freezer bowl in the dishwasher. Wash by hand.
Do not put freezer bowl in freezer if bowl is wet. Do not store lid, mixing arm, or base in freezer
